targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""})
sum by(pod, container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""})

sum by(pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}) - sum by(pod, container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""})

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".+", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container) /
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~".+", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container)
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""})
